name: Dubonnet Cocktail
description: Sometimes known as the Zaza, the Dubonnet Cocktail dates to around 1914. A simple mixture of dry gin and the French aperitif wine called Dubonnet, the Dubonnet Cocktail has the oomph you look for in a cocktail along with the mild bitter edge that makes it perfect as a pre-dinner drink.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well for 20 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a piece of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.
